overview: Alana, an adolescent immigrant, is obligated to leave the United States due to her family's visa issues. Forced out of the comfort zone, overwhelmed by the haunting anxiety of giving up her home, Alana notices even her closest friends are unable to understand her torment. Powerless in the face of the overarching deportation, she turns to escapism and negligence. Coming to terms with the shift in her life, Alana seeks new experiences, all but to find herself in an exciting company of Sophie, the only person who isn’t willing to let Alana go.
title: Underlined
